column5: Looking for floating superlines or superlines with minimum water absorption  The only one I know is - Nanofil - HydroFloat   Thanks
P-Line Hydrofloat?  Never used it myself but it's supposed to float
Fire line crystal. Awesome senko line. Floats and it is visible. I attach 8lb flouro and u can see slightest movement.
Tried it, Don't recommend it. Yes it floats,but the coating comes off.
I think nanofil is what the cool kids use. I'm gonna give it a go this year. I've been a long time raven user, but think it would be a nice change.

Word of caution, once the below zero temps get here switch back over to the Raven..  Ice in the guides will rip Nanofil to shreds..  That being said nothing comes close to it in above zero temps.. Casts a mile, zero stretch, mends like crazy.
